home.title: Developer Sangje Ahn who communicates constantly
home.description: I enjoy discussing problems and resources together, and tackling important issues collaboratively.
home.aboutDescription1: I develop modern and responsive web applications primarily using React, Next.js, and TypeScript. I have a passion for creating clean code and intuitive user interfaces, and I enjoy learning and applying new technologies.
home.aboutDescription2: While currently focused on frontend development, I have a strong interest in backend technologies and am striving to grow as a full-stack developer. I pursue user-centric design and optimized performance, and am building a culture of continuous improvement in development.
